meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Conference Room 6ES, and by Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the Chair.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the Community Development Coordinator.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the December 5, 2025, Community Development Commission Meeting Minutes.

agenda_items.title: Community Development Division Report
agenda_items.description: Overview of FY 2023-24 Community Development Commission Annual Report, Community Development Block Grant: Timely Expenditure of Funds, and the FY 2025-26 HUD Budget Development Process.

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: General greetings and acknowledgements to staff, commission members and other members of the public.

agenda_items.title: Vice Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: General acknowledgements to staff, commission members and members of the public.

agenda_items.title: CDC Financial Monitoring/Performance Standards Committee Report
agenda_items.description: Consider and approve the FY 2024-25 Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Extensions and Reprogramming Funds Recommendations.

agenda_items.title: Announcements
agenda_items.description: Expressions of thanks, congratulations, or condolence; information about holiday schedules; honorary or salutary recognition of public officials.

financial_items.description: FY 2024-25 Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Extensions and Reprogramming Funds Recommendations.
